body_html:
so, what exactly do we want here? If I combine the above suggestions, I can do

(venv)[andersj@devgpu201.prn2 ~/local/pytorch] time bash -c '(cd build && ninja install) && python setup.py develop' >/dev/null 2>&1

real    0m0.910s
user    0m0.883s
sys     0m2.792s

is it enough to just make setup.py rebuild be a synonym for this?

(venv)[andersj@devgpu201.prn2 ~/local/pytorch] time bash -c '(cd build && ninja install) && python setup.py develop' >/dev/null 2>&1

body:
so, what exactly do we want here? If I combine the above suggestions, I can do

```
(venv)[andersj@devgpu201.prn2 ~/local/pytorch] time bash -c '(cd build && ninja install) && python setup.py develop' >/dev/null 2>&1

real    0m0.910s
user    0m0.883s
sys     0m2.792s
```

is it enough to just make `setup.py rebuild` be a synonym for this?
